items.name: Guitar
items.description: A six-stringed instrument that is popular in a variety of music genres known for its versatility and rich sound.

items.name: Bass
items.description: A four-stringed instrument that provides the low-end sound and rhythm in a band or ensemble.

items.name: Ukulele
items.description: A small, four-stringed instrument that is popular in Hawaiian music and known for its bright, cheerful sound.

items.name: Violin
items.description: A four-stringed instrument known for its high-pitched sound and prominent role in classical music, orchestras, and various other music genres.
